attributes.action: re-open the greenlanes and public byways that have lost vechicular access under the NERC bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NERC Bill gained Royal Assent on 30/3/06, and is now the Natural Environment & Rural Communities Act 2006.
Under NERC we have lost the rights to drive along thousands of miles of public rights of way.
We the undersigned beleve this to be descrimitory towards motor vechicle users in our free access to these byways

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "re-open the greenlanes and public byways that have lost vechicular access under the NERC bill."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11185.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/reclaimRUPs/
